Localizations.Whether to use the Console API to clear: Ko don amfani da Console API don share rubutu ko don amfani da saurin share jerin VT. Idan Ƙarya ne, Marquee zai yi amfani da jerin VT masu dacewa. In ba haka ba, zai yi amfani da ƙila API ɗin Console mai hankali.

Localizations.Enables debugging for screensavers. Plea: Yana ba da damar gyara kurakurai don masu adana allo. Da fatan za a lura cewa yana iya sauri ya cika rajistan kuskuren kuma ya ɗan rage jinkirin mai adana allo, ya danganta da mai adana allo da aka yi amfani da shi. Yana aiki kawai idan an kunna gyaran kernel don dalilai na bincike.
